references.paper_title: Deep Learning Face Attributes in the Wild
references.reason: This paper introduces the CelebA dataset, which is central to the analysis in the current paper and a widely used benchmark for fairness methods.

references.paper_title: Grad-CAM: Visual Explanations from Deep Networks via Gradient-based Localization
references.reason: This paper introduces Grad-CAM, the method used to generate attention maps, a core component of the Attention-IoU metric.

references.paper_title: Deep Residual Learning for Image Recognition
references.reason: This paper introduces ResNet, a fundamental architecture used as the backbone in the experiments, validating the applicability of Attention-IoU.
This paper introduces the Waterbirds dataset, a synthetic dataset used to validate the proposed metric's ability to accurately reflect bias.

references.paper_title: Learning Deep Features for Discriminative Localization
references.reason: This paper provides the basis to measure the localization of the models, a key aspect of the current methodology.
